name: Army Secret Operation
description:
Download the Best Army Secret Operation Game and join the legend snipers using your sniper skills to make the peace happen.
Army Secret Operation is an exciting and challenging game. You can fight with your enemy and save the your country. Become one of the most deadly sniper stealth assassins and do all the jobs assigned to you. Take out all of your targets and enemies.
Before starting every new job there is a briefing about the target and other details relating to the mission. Read them carefully, it will help you to understand the limits of the job and the target details. Any instructions about prohibited target or any restrictions also included in the briefing notes. You must follow the instructions to accomplish the missions.
Become the ultimate assassin shooter and perfect sniper by saving all of humans.
It’s not your ordinary gun shooting game, its’ the Sniper Shooting Game. Among best FPS games that’s addictive and a realistic thriller action game.


Army Secret Operation: Features

Smooth FPS Game Controls
Easy to Access weapon store
Excellent war zone graphics
HD graphics.
Free to Download from app store.
